website_summaries.verdict: Any little one would look adorable in these costumes, and the 2-piece design makes them easy to get on and off even an active baby.
pros: Costumes come in a many options: girl, boy, and unisex costumes
Made of soft, high-quality fleece that washes well
Costumes consist of 2 pieces, making them easy to take on and off for diaper changes
cons: Costumes tend to run small, so size up if in doubt

customer_reviews.title: The most adorable pineapple ever!
customer_reviews.text: The price point was fair given the fact that shipping was faster and at no extra charge like everywhere else. Besides that point it was worth the every penny. It comes in 3 pieces. Leggings, long sleeve shirt and body suit. The body suit was padded to give you the round feel. It was soft to touch, light, and kept my little one warm when trick or treating. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Lana Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Fits as expected, quality is fabulous! And warm material!
customer_reviews.text: SO SO SO CUTE! My 1 year old fits in 18-24 month clothes so I bought 18 month pineapple outfit. She’s 25 lbs, has very long legs so the underpants are a bit short but that is hidden by the main pineapple piece. This is very soft and pretty warm for our Chilly Oregon fall October weather. Very impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for playtime & Halloween
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we wanted! Cute & well made. The right size for our 3 year old. We also bought the Hanna Anderson version, which was nice (and more expensive) but was too large & heavy for our 3 year old to trick or treat in. We are very happy with this Carter's one!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Donnelly

customer_reviews.title: Does not function as a baby carrier. Decorative only.
customer_reviews.text: The picture makes you think that the straps will fit around the adult and support the child. Wrong! The item only fits around the child. You have to figure out your own way of supporting the child. This is NOT a baby carrier. The velcro straps are barely strong enough to sustain the item. I am keeping the item but will have to modify it for my own purposes. If you are looking for a decoration to place OVER a carrier, this will do. Otherwise, find another item, if you can.
customer_reviews.author: RickSilver

customer_reviews.title: So perfect for colder temps!
customer_reviews.text: My picture does not do this costume justice. The costume is beyond adorable! I purchased this because our temperature here was in the 30s Halloween night; I wanted something warm and adorable. Check, check, and check! My daughter is on the small side, 16 months and the 12 month size fit her perfectly. It comes with a white long sleeve shirt and black leggings. We doubled up on her leggings for extra warmth and put a fleece jacket on her underneath and she was comfortable. The bottom on this costume is puffy so when she walked it was just too cute! Would definitely recommend this costume; overall quality was great and price point as well.
customer_reviews.author: TylerandJune

customer_reviews.title: ADORABLE - PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: I love Carter's anything and everything. Just like any other Carter's items I have purchased, this is well made and high quality. It came with the tights, the long sleeve shirt, and the unicorn part. My daughter stayed warm and was comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: Our sons nickname is Avocado, so we decided for his first Halloween to dress him as one! We ordered a 24 month but it’s still kinda snug on him. He is already in 2t-3t clothes but it’s seriously so cute.
customer_reviews.author: M.P.MERCADO

customer_reviews.title: adorable Halloween costume and great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and much higher quality than similarly priced costumes at the Halloween stores. I have washed and dried (on low heat setting) twice and it still looks great! Very soft. It seems to run true to size. My son is wearing 6-9 month clothes and while it is a little big, it fits him pretty well overall. Would highly recommend this to others! Also, the pants can be used post Halloween as tan sweatpants with regular clothes so that's a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Cutest Chicken Ever!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly, soft and warm. Received many laughs on Facebook!
customer_reviews.author: jimjam

customer_reviews.title: Cutest Costume! Great fit! Exactly as Pictured!
customer_reviews.text: Love this cute Halloween costume from Carters and great price and quality as with all of their clothing! It fits big on my almost 3 month old but she’ll be 3 months exactly when she wears it so hoping she’ll fill out more in the next few weeks before halloween. However the shirt and leggings are stretchy so she can still wear and pull it off now even though it’s a tad too big. Colors and texture are exactly as pictured as well which is great because a lot of times stuff you buy online especially clothing isn’t.
customer_reviews.author: Camille W Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Cute but runs small
customer_reviews.text: Adorable but runs small. We got the 12-mo size for our 7-mo-old, washed it first as instructed, and then put it on her and couldn't zip it all the way up. Definitely runs small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a cute little outfit. Fits a little small. The only thing I didn’t like is the shirt is a little short and isn’t great quality as it is a little floppy and the fabric stretches and makes it look cheap. The tights are thick and good quality. The pineapple is thick, warm, and very well-made.
customer_reviews.author: Humour

customer_reviews.title: Soft, cute and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has her daddy’s long legs and the chunkiest little thighs. It’s hard to find clothes for her but this was the sweetest costume with the simple white, long sleeved shirt, matching tights and the unicorn hoodie as the finishing touch. She looked absolutely adorable in it but she also looked really comfortable as well. So glad we found this one in time for Halloween.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and comfy! Didn't leave any marks on his face either!
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars for sure! So comfy and perfect for my 10month old chunky monkey boy! My son is 27lbs and 30" tall and I got the 24months size and it fits him great with clothes underneath so he stays warm in the new england cooler weather!
customer_reviews.author: EricaD18

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic little costume.
customer_reviews.text: It's every bit as adorable as it looks, complete with stubby little tail feathers on the back. Some quick notes that may not be otherwise apparent: -It is poofy/stuffed with a quiltlike filling that made it nice and warm -It comes with the white longsleeve shirt and the blue leggings, which is thoughtful (and I was not expecting)
customer_reviews.author: J. Cornella

customer_reviews.title: Great buy. Love my little  Dalmatian
customer_reviews.text: So well made. So soft on the inside and out. My song is 18 months and the 18 month fits great! Pretty true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley N.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful costume!!!
customer_reviews.text: You cannot imagine how many compliments I received when I put this costume to my daughter! After she wear it. I put in one app to sell it and it got sold in one day! Everybody loved it
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Very cute!
customer_reviews.text: This is great if you live in a place that doesn't get very cold. I thought it was going to be hot, but I'm glad I had the option of the the pants and shirt because it ended up being chilly. This is super cute and soft. My one year old liked wearing it, and he looked so cute! He got a lot of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Tiger Laura

customer_reviews.title: Cute and warm
customer_reviews.text: Cute for baby’s first Halloween. I’m glad I bought the 12 month, even though my day has been consistently wearing size 9 in Carters. I did not zip it all the way up in front, it was too tight for my comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Jen_J

customer_reviews.title: Better than I could have imagined!
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality costume at an affordable price point. It's absolutely adorable, super soft and the size is true to fit. I would highly recommend if you are looking for a unicorn costume for your baby.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Comfy for 10 month old
customer_reviews.text: So cute! Purchased 12month size for our 10month (wears 9month onesies)... It fit perfectly and was comfy/easy to move in. She took her first little steps wearing this costume!
customer_reviews.author: Shea

customer_reviews.title: Must buy especially for little ones
customer_reviews.text: So cute. My daughter for so many compliments on this cute little pineapple. Fits perfectly for my 1 year old who is in 9-12 month clothes. Kept her warm during idaho October weather and was super easy for mom to just thrown on this outfit and have it all together with leggings and shirt. Must buy
customer_reviews.author: Lacey Boyer

customer_reviews.title: The skunk was so cute!
customer_reviews.text: I got the skunk for my daughter. We call her our Stinker because Lord that girl has some stinkers! This came out so cute! The top is a little puffy sweater with a zipper and hood. It comes with very soft and thick black pants. We got a ton of complements on it!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Cutest costume
customer_reviews.text: Sooo cute! We got so many compliments! Comes with leggings that are reasonably warm, but the shirt wasn’t useful. It would ride up really severely under the avocado suit. If they want to include a shirt, it should be a bodysuit. Kind of pricey for a baby costume.
customer_reviews.author: A. Faust

customer_reviews.title: Little bit tight but very cute
customer_reviews.text: Love the design. Could also be used outside of costume purposes as the stripped pants and top are separate from the vest ( attached hood). I probably would have sized up slightly as lengthways my bubs a little longer than completely comfortable but not enough to warrant a return/exchange
customer_reviews.author: Jess C

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the simplicity of the costume. Cute top/bottom combo of matching pink and white stripes. Then add the llama vest on top. Wasn’t too hot and wasn’t fussy. She was happy all night and received dozens of compliments from trick-or-treaters or their parents. Good fit.
customer_reviews.author: Chanel Wright

customer_reviews.title: Looks exactly like the photo. (Will not be answering questions)
customer_reviews.text: My 17-month-old daughter is 30 lbs and 32 inches tall. I got her the 24 month size. I tried it on her as soon as it arrived, and didn't think to take photos; however, it fits perfectly. The tights were my biggest concern since she is tall, but she has plenty of room.
customer_reviews.author: Che

customer_reviews.title: Loved the costume
customer_reviews.text: This was absolutely adorable! We loved the tail and got tons of compliments. The body part was super easy to put on and off so we were able to take it off to put my daughter in the carseat and then just slip it back on when we got to our destination.
customer_reviews.author: megpez14

customer_reviews.title: So Cute! Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: My almost 2 year old daughter wore the 24 mo costume for Halloween this year--it fit her really well and she definitely had room to run around. It's a wonderfully made vest-like costume with striped tights and long sleeved white tee. The material is really soft and held up well in the wash. We're in a warmer area and the costume was just fine with a short sleeved onesie underneath instead of the long sleeve. Got so many great compliments on this costume! Would gladly recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Adrianna Gallegos

customer_reviews.title: So adorable!
customer_reviews.text: This costume is seriously so precious!! My two year old was not sure what to think at first, but didn't want to take it off after catching a glimpse of herself in the mirror! Can't wait for Halloween!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Spear

customer_reviews.title: Cute quality baby costume
customer_reviews.text: This skunk costume is so STINKING cute!! See what I did there? ;) Anyway, this is my son's costume for his first Halloween and I cannot wait. It's adorable, and because it's Carter's, it's good quality. It's nice and thick so it will keep him warm too.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Loved that my almost toddler could get out of it fast! It was thick and warm. I will keep for my daughter to use next year! Pants kinda long. Worth the money if you can find other ways to re use it! Does not fall apart after wash!
customer_reviews.author: Stella

customer_reviews.title: Love this costume
customer_reviews.text: So cute! My 7 month old looked adorable in this. My only complaint is that we live in the south and this costume is very thick and warm with the fleece. If you live somewhere the weather is cold on Halloween it would be perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Sloth Costume
customer_reviews.text: We love sloths in this house and can’t wait for Halloween to get to wear this. We are also doing our babies pictures in this costume with all of his sloth stuffed animals. So cute!
customer_reviews.author: Keli Ryva

customer_reviews.title: Adorable costume!
customer_reviews.text: The lion costume is adorable!! I purchased for my 16-month son's second Halloween. I got the 18-month size, it was a tad too big but he was easily able to wear it. He is on the bigger side for his age so I wasn't too worried. It has the most adorable padding around the tummy/lower back so he looked like a cute, chubby little lion. Plus, it was very soft and comfortable. He LOVED wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Jenessa Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Cute and warm
customer_reviews.text: Love this costume for my one year old she look to cute in it kept her nice in warm with the hood and the fleece material. The tail in the back look like it would bother her at first when she sat but she seemed to have to problem with it.
customer_reviews.author: maria

customer_reviews.title: ADORABLE 3 piece! Pineapple, white shirt and green stockings
customer_reviews.text: My daughter got a ton of compliments! It was soft and fitnher perfectly. 2 yo, weighs 27 lbs so the 24 month size was perfect. She didn’t wear the tee shirt bc it would have been too hot here in FL. Great unisex costume, definitely saving for another baby at some point.. perfect for a boy or girl!
customer_reviews.author: A&E

customer_reviews.title: Cutest llama
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest llama costume I’ve ever seen! It fit my very tall 1 1/2 year old so well. The hood has the llamas eyes and nose on it and has a sweet arrangement of small flowers. My daughter loves it and so do i!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Scarr

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: This is a super cute and well made costume. For reference, my baby is 4 months old, 22lbs and 27.5 inches. The 12mo size fits him perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Was super cute! Fit my kid perfectly. VERY soft. My son is 9 months old at 30 pounds and this size was a great fit, even the tights fit his chunky legs which I was worried about. kept him warm, and the hood is very baby friendly he didn't mind it on at all. Would buy this product again
customer_reviews.author: Rushel Kiser

customer_reviews.title: Adorable costume!
customer_reviews.text: This Lion costume is super adorable! It does fit pretty true to size, my 7 month old is 22lbs and I ordered the 18 month so I could have room to layer under it and it fits great. It is super soft and just plain adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Lopez

customer_reviews.title: 17 month old loves it RARRR!
customer_reviews.text: Fits great and my 17 month old loves wearing it. It's soft and great quality. The stomach has a little bit of padding in it to fill it out. The head hoodie is surprisingly comfortable, too. My son usually hates wearing something on his head but he had the lion head hoodie on the whole time.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Khalili

customer_reviews.title: Son actually kept the hood on!
customer_reviews.text: Bought the lion 18 month size for my 15 month old son for Halloween. I had purchased another lion costume with a detachable hood, which my son hated and immediately took off. This worked perfectly! It kept his hands free to hold onto things and has a cute tail that stays up by itself and is quite warm with the extra padding on the torso. It’s Carter’s brand, so good quality and sizing. I’d buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cutest unicorn ever!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most darling costume!! My 2 year old wore it trick or treating on Halloween and everybody loved it. Plus it's cozy and comfortable. Perfect for cold weather and the hood is great if it rains. Comes with the under shirt and tights, too which is so great.
customer_reviews.author: johnsonk

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: It's cute on my son but it's really thick so if you're living in somewhere hot then it's not for you. The belly is stuffed and chubby and big which makes it a little uncomfortable for the child.
customer_reviews.author: SimonAndSally

customer_reviews.title: Super cute, wearable, adorable
customer_reviews.text: Loved this outfit. True to size, nice and roomy and very warm! No layers needed. Durably constructed, we wore it to the zoo a bunch of times as well as out and about for halloween. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: Excellent costume
customer_reviews.text: Adorable. Fits great. Came with all the parts needed. Absolutely would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rini723

customer_reviews.title: cute and high quality
customer_reviews.text: my chunky 9 month old is filling out the 12 month size nicely. If you have a chunky bebe too, size up. super cute and feels well made, not like that crappy thin stuff costumes are usually made of.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: a little small
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 6-9 month. My daughter was exactly 6 months on Halloween and this fit tight. She was in the 50% percentile for height and weight so I'd say its a little small.
customer_reviews.author: melody stottlemyer

customer_reviews.title: Cutest baby dragon in the kingdom!!
customer_reviews.text: The quality you expect from Carter’s clothing. Soft and easy to get on and off. Adorable!! Her grandpa flew her all around the house on Halloween and everyone loved her costume!!
customer_reviews.author: smilesoftexas

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: Great costume. Super soft and love the little green and white striped tights. The 6mo. Size fit my 3mo. Old great. We have Michigan Halloweens and they are usually cold and raining/snowing. Was able to layer and keep her warm.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Too darn cute! In a world of princesses and super heros our babies are barn yard animals. Let me tell you this custome was a hit and people are still taking about it.
customer_reviews.author: C.B.Chu

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend buying
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality, super comfortable. My 12 month old could literally wear this to sleep it's so comfy. Also is durable after being machine washed and dried.
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: So adorable and soft. I like that it is just a sweater and pants, not a complicated costume. I put my son in a onesie and the pants for the day and then just threw on the sweater to take him out for Halloween. I ordered a 3-6 month and it fits him perfectly. He is 4 months old.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute!
customer_reviews.text: We will use this as my daughter's first Halloween costume. We have tried it on her, and it fits great. The hood is a little big and the ears flop over, unlike they did in the pictures previewed in the item. Besides those things, this is the cutest. She looks so cute in it and I can't wait for everyone to see her.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its perfect !
customer_reviews.text: It is the cutest costume ever, fits size perfectly, maybe a tad bit bigger but it is so cute !
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Klein

customer_reviews.title: Soooo cute and a great brand
customer_reviews.text: Super cute. Soft and will keep baby extra warm. Made very well can be washed in washing machine without issue
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves Kungfu Panda so when I bought him a ninja outfit for Halloween I thought it would be super cute to go ahead and get him a panda suit too and throw the ninja outfit over it. It was so stinking cute!! The outfit is padded around the midsection so it made him look so chubby and very panda like!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Payne

customer_reviews.title: Super CUTE costume!!!
customer_reviews.text: Loved everything about this costume.!!?Super soft, comes with tights and under shirt. Fit my 6 month old oerfeci. Great quality. Happy with my purchase. I did see the same costume at TJmaxx for $10 bucks cheaper. But I thought $25 was a fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and warm.
customer_reviews.text: Cute costume that fit perfectly. My son is 9 months and I ordered 12 month size. I'd recommend ordering up a size as getting the arms in you need a little room. Was soft and warm and my son loved it. Great quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Velazquez

customer_reviews.title: No leggings
customer_reviews.text: I’m very angry! This item is clearly not new AND it did not come with the leggings. $30 is way too much for an incomplete baby costume. I will be returning this product.
customer_reviews.author: Emily B.

customer_reviews.title: Helemono pineapple hawaii
customer_reviews.text: Living in hawaii, it was only fitting to have our daughter be a little pineapple.. she was so cute on Halloween night.. everyone loved it. The green and white stockings are a little short... and the pi neapple costume itself was a little loose ( but it was super cute being a little big...it made her butt kind of wiggle when she walked). Would recommend this costume... it was perfect for evening trick or treating here ii n hawaii... might want thicker pants if you plan on trick or treating in colder weather.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Cute costume with shirt and tights
customer_reviews.text: Cute and warm, but the shirt isn't a onesie, so it rolls up. Also, wish this came with pants rather than tights, otherwise a great quality costume!
customer_reviews.author: Montana Mama

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy material and definitely worth the price. Love that its a hood not a hat. Basically fits like a pants and jacket and it works prefectly and kept my 6 month old very warm
customer_reviews.author: Carley_butner

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Super Soft and warm! Looked so cute on my daughter. She is almost 2 yrs old and a bit bigger for her age. I bought the 2t and it fit great.
customer_reviews.author: JB81

customer_reviews.title: Cute outfit good quality
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 11 month old perfect. I’m hoping Halloween is a cold night because this is a very warm little loin outfit. It’s even cuter in person.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for Halloween! Everyone loved it!! Very soft, not too warm (TX has warm Halloweens sometimes), perfect fit!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Curry

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh this is the cutest thing ever! My son looks absolutely adorable in it and it’s super warm for the chilly Halloween nights!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Thoman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect baby costume
customer_reviews.text: My baby wore this for Halloween and was such a hit with everyone. He was so cute in the sloth costume.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea D

customer_reviews.title: Warm, cozy, and cute!
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect toddler costumes! They’re warm, cozy, and cute! Perfect for a Montana Halloween with no need to hide your costume under your winter coat!
customer_reviews.author: ReadsJane

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: This costume was so dang adorable and warm. I also love that my baby can continue to wear the shirt with other things.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Frederick

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: Super cute as pictured. Comfy two pieces so it's practical, still using the pants as a pj. Tummy has stuffing which made our son look like a little stuffed lion dill so cute and kept him warm.
customer_reviews.author: EBoz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for little kiddos
customer_reviews.text: Adorable. My son loved it. I felt like the price was right. He won’t take it off!!
customer_reviews.author: Nat

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t have the right size for my three month old but the six month is exactly the same size as carter’s six month outfits.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Collins

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this. We made it work for my one year old tractor obsessed child. Big enough that it could be worn much older as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We got so many compliments!
customer_reviews.text: The fit was perfect for my 12 month old and it was warm enough for a cool Halloween. We got a lot of compliments for how cute she was! Also the quality is durable; what you would expect from a Carter's brand. Yes, a bit on the pricey side but it ended up being totally worth it!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda J Wang

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, fits great
customer_reviews.text: Love love love, 2T fit just right. My son was so freaking adorable. I want him to wear it for more than Halloween lol.
customer_reviews.author: Shy Violet

customer_reviews.title: Adorable baby dinosaur
customer_reviews.text: Baby Dinosaur looked adorable in his dinosaur costume, only complaint is the hood is way to big
customer_reviews.author: EvilBarbie

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but no diaper snaps
customer_reviews.text: Cute! Worked well, and was warm for 55 degrees. Only negative is lack of snaps at the crotch for easy diaper changes.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: So cute, get it!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously so adorable!! I love how the belly is puffy. Definitely kept my son warm on Halloween! Nice fleece material.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Ramer

customer_reviews.title: so many compliments and easy for little's to wear
customer_reviews.text: way too cute for words! so many compliments and easy for little's to wear....very comfy, she felt like she was in jammies, but cozy and warm as it cooled down in the evening. :) Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Beach Momma

customer_reviews.title: Love this costume!
customer_reviews.text: This costume is super cute! I bought a yellow jumpsuit and it worked perfect. 🐣🐤🐔🐥
customer_reviews.author: Infiniti22

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but small.
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute costume but the picture is slightly misleading. The hat and booties are 0-3 month size.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith S

customer_reviews.title: Great infant costume!
customer_reviews.text: Nice thick quality, perfect for a chilly Halloween night. The quality is exactly what you would expect from Carters.
customer_reviews.author: Janet H.

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected. It was hot when she wore it, so I didn't do the pants that came with it, but those can be used in their own outfit
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, slightly short in the torso
customer_reviews.text: Loved this costume! We added a little extra to her costume by adding white feathers to her baby carrier which was adorable!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Well made, just runs a bit small.
customer_reviews.text: This costume was super cute for one of our daughters Halloween costumes. It runs a little small.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Cute until it broke
customer_reviews.text: It was the cutest outfit ever, until the first diaper change when the zipper that held the outfit together completely broke. We hadn’t even taken her out and had to get another outfit.
customer_reviews.author: A. Black

customer_reviews.title: Made very well.
customer_reviews.text: Costume is adorable. Luckily runs a bit small baby is barely 2 1/2 months but a little chubby. Says boys in the description. The price was raised last minute ...a little disappointing. Overall love the costume.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Perez

customer_reviews.title: Happy Little Llama
customer_reviews.text: My little llama was beautiful!! I loved the quality of the material. It was very comfortable for her.
customer_reviews.author: Abelina P.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So cute! We got so many compliments! I wish carters costumes came in bigger sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Bmom

customer_reviews.title: Hat is for newborn ... Keep shopping
customer_reviews.text: So small Doesn't fit as pictured Hat is for a new born Ridiculous Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: bobbiesgirl

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son this past Halloween. We live in Hawaii so did not need the shirt/pants. He looked adorable and everyone kept telling me how cute he was. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I expected. Perfect fit and so adorable!
customer_reviews.author: Ahve

customer_reviews.title: Awesome costume!
customer_reviews.text: Got the avocado costumer for my 20 mo old who wears 18-24 mo clothing. It fit well and was so cute! The tights are footed so if your kiddo is really tall they may be too short.
customer_reviews.author: C. Grennes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It is made very nicely, comfy, not overly complicated. I can’t wait for Halloween!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Cute, warm, soft costume
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter has lived in her avacado costume for the month. It's soft and, yes, washable. So very cute!
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Tight chest
customer_reviews.text: Super cute custome however the 6-9 month size was too tight in the chest for my 6.5 month old. She typically wears 6-9 months with then being loose at this stage. Returned for the 12 month so she can wear a sweatshirt if need be.
customer_reviews.author: vikki

customer_reviews.title: Cutest Costume On Earth
customer_reviews.text: I wish the hood was somehow adjustable, but it was the CUTEST Halloween costume!
customer_reviews.author: My Liebchen

customer_reviews.title: Cute wish it was cheaper. But worth it
customer_reviews.text: Cutest thing ever and kept baby warm. My bb is small so it’s very roomy for her.
customer_reviews.author: G
